title: Convergence of Industrial Heritage and Mathematics: Project-Based Learning with Digital Storytelling

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts (statistics, ratios, geometry) and general knowledge of industrial heritage
context.additional_context: Program for pre-service teachers to reinterpret industrial heritage's historical context through mathematical modeling and storytelling, simultaneously enhancing cultural literacy and teaching competencies

learning_goals: Students can analyze and visualize industrial heritage cases using mathematical data (production volume, ratios, spatial structures).
They can complete a project that narrates historical changes of industrial heritage through storytelling using digital tools (smartphone apps).
They can present results of mathematically inferring the cultural value of industrial heritage as a 3-minute video or audio content.

resources: Local Industrial Heritage Field Visit Materials
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
